description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of June Christy, 1947 or 1948] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 066 Reference print available in Music Division, Library of Congress. Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Group portraits--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950.
